snippet: The Orange also finished the regular season with 30 wins for the first time in Coach Jim Boeheim’s 36-year tenure.
abstract: College Basketball National Men's Roundup; Syracuse defeats Louisville, 58-49, matching the Big East record for regular season victories with 17; other men's college scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Orange also finished the regular season with 30 wins for the first time in Coach Jim Boeheim’s 36-year tenure.

headline.seo: 17th Big East Win for Syracuse Ties Record
headline.main: 17th Big East Win for Syracuse Ties Record
headline.print_headline: Syracuse’s 17th Victory In Big East Ties Record
